mapper.select: SELECT b.bno, b.title, b.regdate, b.hit, b.id, m.name, m.grade from board_${b_name} b INNER JOIN member m ON b.id=m.id order BY b.bno desc LIMIT #{limitNum}, #{amount}
SELECT b.bno, b.title, b.content, b.regdate, b.updatedate, b.hit, b.id, m.name, m.grade from board_${b_name} b INNER JOIN member m ON b.id=m.id where bno = #{bno}
mapper.insert: insert into board_${b_name} (title, content, regdate, updatedate, hit, id) values (#{title}, #{content},now(),now(),0,#{id})
mapper.select: SELECT t.rank FROM (SELECT bno, rank() over(ORDER BY bno ASC) AS rank FROM board_${b_name}) t WHERE t.bno= #{bno}
